fields.title: Digital Illustration

fields.description: Some digital drawings since 2014, completed with the iPad and Procreate (a digital illustration app). The portraits were inspired by  the TV series “Sherlock”, “Game of Thrones” and my cats Bobo and Mumu. Video recordings of the drawing process are included.

fields.summary: Speed to market was vital in launching the digital venture for ComfortDelGro

content.value: Speed to market was vital in launching the digital venture for ComfortDelGro. With the enormous efforts of the team, Zig was designed and launched on App Stores within only 6 months.

fields.title: Design System
fields.description: A system balancing aesthetics and functionalities, with thorough documentation and demos for development

fields.summary: Having a design system significantly speeded up our development time.

content.value: Having a design system significantly speeded up our development time. With those reusable components, the development team focused more on logic and built more than 700 screens and edge cases in a relatively short amount of time.

fields.summary: The collaboration with the design team happens even more frequently

content.value: The collaboration with the design team happens even more frequently when it comes to motion. Since it requires back and forth refinements to determine the best way of implementing an interaction, we explored implementation along with the motion designer, which speeded up development time.

fields.summary: Zig - Design System - Component Gallery Explanation
Afterward, the design engineering team built all the components in code

content.value: Afterward, the design engineering team built all the components in code and created a component gallery within the app structure. Each component has a separate demo page in the gallery, demonstrating all the functions and variations available for use. Developers can easily open this gallery from the app and check how to use each component via interactive demos and code examples.

fields.summary: Zig - Design System - Gallery in the app

fields.title: Design Engineering
fields.description: Leading a new discipline and team bridging design and technology

fields.summary: Zig - Design Engineering - Collaboration in Production
During the production, we constantly coordinated with both the design tea

content.value: During the production, we constantly coordinated with both the design team and engineering team and set up multiple processes to facilitate the design engineering practice:
Hold regular meetings with the design team and within the design engineering team, where we align on issues and explore improving the app experience.
Set up and utilize a set of collaboration tools, such as Miro board to break down designs into logic flows, Google Spreadsheet to track the status of design-related issues.
Compose a best practice guide for the entire development team on building design, structuring code, conducting code review, and adding documentation.

fields.summary: Zig - Design Engineering - Collaboration with Brand Team
The design engineering practice requires close collaboration with the design team.

content.value: The design engineering practice requires close collaboration with the design team. The collaboration started at the beginning of the project: Early in the brand design phase, we worked with the brand team and built prototypes with code to provide directions on how brand identity can expand into a scalable system.

fields.summary: Zig - Design Engineering - What is design engineering
What the team has done is much more than just i

content.value: What the team has done is much more than just implementing existing designs. Instead, we learned the thinking behind designs, worked together with the designers and created experiences that make sense for both sides.

fields.summary: In building Zig, we introduced a new design engine

content.value: In building Zig, we introduced a new design engineering discipline and assembled a dedicated design engineering team. I was leading this team of 4 engineers to bridge between design and engineering teams.

fields.title: Experience
fields.description: Public Transportation + Taxi Booking + Restaurants + Deals + Takeaway

fields.content:
Brand Design, Prototyping, Tech Solution Research, App Production, Team Management, Client Communication

Leading the design engineering team, leading the implementation of design system, component library, core features (Map Interaction, Journey Planning, Favourites, Loyalty)

fields.title: Results
fields.description: 6 months from concept to public launch. #1 Travel app in Singapore.

fields.content:
Tech: Laurent Thevenet, Rollen Gomes, Meilissa Lee, Ikhsanudin Hakim, Andre Napitupulu
Design: Ben Miles, Aron Mayo, Sam Mularczyk, Sharmila Roseli, Sabrina Lau

fields.summary: Together with the design team, we created an original design lang

content.value: Delivered using Flutter, Google’s latest mobile technology platform, the app was built once and deployed twice for iOS and Android, which also unlocked the possibility of having a singular experience across all mobile devices.

Together with the design team, we created an original design language for the new brand and developed it into a design system. It is a truly modular, truly future-proof design system that is used in both product design on Figma and the tech team’s implementation into the app.

fields.summary: The design system is one outcome of the collaboration between the

content.value: The design system is one outcome of the collaboration between the design engineering team and the design team.

fields.summary: Zig - Design System - Comparison to Flutter Library
Zig - Design System - Design System Parts

fields.content: Sergio Kuba, Ryan Davidson, Rollen Gomes, Wing Luo, Eric Simonson, Aldo Padilla, Eugene Ahn

fields.title: Zig - App for lifestyle & mobility
fields.subtitle: ComfortDelGro
fields.description:
Zig is a mobile lifestyle platform that innovatively combines journey planning, transport booking, and lifestyle discovery into an all-in-one mobile app built for the global land transport giant ComfortDelGro.

Leveraging multidisciplinary consulting design and technology teams from R/GA, Zig is crafted from the ground up using modern technology, design, and branding, creating unique value for users and becoming Singapore’s first-ever mobility lifestyle platform.

fields.summary: Zig - Results - From Concept to Launch
